Package com.cbfacademy.frugalflyer.flights.exceptions

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.cbfacademy.frugalflyer.flights.exceptions.GlobalExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
Class that handles exceptions for mulitple controllers across the application.
